snippet: On his weekly radio show Friday, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg provided no details on whether he would support Mitt Romney over President Obama. Our colleagues over on the City Room blog have the full report.
abstract: On his weekly radio show Friday, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg provided no details on whether he would support Mitt Romney over President Obama. Our colleagues over on the City Room blog have the full report.

headline.main: Mayor Offers Few Details on Romney's New York Visit
